siteTitle: リャン　ジェシー - エンジンエア
job: ソフトウェアエンジニア
aboutContent: 東京在住、アメリカ出身のソフトウェアエンジニアです。今まで、婚活アプリやスマホ用のゲーム等、様々なプロジェクトに参加しました。仕事以外でも、Rustを学ぶことや知り合いの為にサイトを作ることが好きです。コードをしていない時は、サイクリングをしたり、料理をしたり、愛犬のスルギと遊んだりしています。ソフトウェアエンジニアとして常に成長できる機会を求めているので、コードに関してや、数学的なプロジェクトのアイディアがあれば、是非ご連絡ください！

descriptions.title: rhythm game (concept, prototype)
bullets: Expertly designing and implementing input system, event manager, and score manager to calculate and broadcast information about score, tap timing, and other core game functionality.
Diligently designing and building the song layout functionality to visually represent a song’s Json data.
Carefully dapting a Midi to Json converter which translated song files from the audio team into game-usable data.

descriptions.title: girls band cry (concept, prototype)
bullets: Expertly designing and implementing input system, event manager, and score manager to calculate and broadcast information about score, tap timing, and other core game functionality.
Diligently designing and building the song layout functionality to visually represent a song’s Json data.
Carefully dapting a Midi to Json converter which translated song files from the audio team into game-usable data.

descriptions.title: react application for aflac
bullets: Developed responsive UI using the Atomic Components philosophy to ensure code and corresponding work was not repeated.
Mentored coworkers who had not used React about React life cycles, component structure, and code styles.
Integrated complex APIs using React Hooks in Functional Components
Member of the Commonwealth Honors College
division 1 mens lacrosse (2016 - 2018)

descriptions.title: girls band cry (concept, prototype)
bullets: A concept and prototype for an upcoming rhythm rpg game built in C# and Unity.

descriptions.title: otakon and sibling sites
bullets: A family of niche matchmaking services built in Ruby and Rails and hosted on AWS.

bullets: A suite of complex forms built with React and TypeScript and structured following atomic design patterns.

descriptions.title: gundam: iron blooded orphans
bullets: A recently released iOS rpg, gacha, and battle game built in C# and Unity.
